column4: I am not able to boot a a fresh install of xubuntu on my desktop.  It also won't boot the live install CD
What are the cpu specs and where does it get stuck at?
it sticks on "unable to execute '/sbin/getty' for tty1 no such file or directory"
compaq d220, 1.24 gig ram, 30 and 40 gig HD, NVIDIA GeForce2 MX 400
sorry, u did ask that... celeron 2.4Ghz
live cd just freezes, and tty processes terminate with status 225
it isn't helping win my wife away from that other OS
No doubt.. did you say this is a Jaunty live cd 9.04 and that you already ran the cd check utility?
tried the live CD on the laptop I'm on now and it works fine.  did run cd check and it checks out
it is xubuntu Jaunty, but i've tried kub and ub with the sane result...
Not sure what's going on then. Try a different OS for testing maybe? not really sure what's going on. Maybe ask in #linux
thanks!  i'll give it a shot.
